ValidationRule.description: A Case in status Closed can only change to Reopened
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED(Status), OR( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status), "Closed"), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status), "Closed-Accepted"), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status), "Closed-Rejected") ), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status, "Reopened")) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Een Case mag vanuit status "Gesloten" alleen naar "Heropend"
